title: Get Involved label fix and refreshed Ministries imagery

requirements.summary: Rename the Ministry Auxiliaries item from “Altar Bearers” to “Armor Bearers” on the Get Involved page.
acceptanceCriteria: On /get-involved, within the “Ministry Auxiliaries” grid, the item title reads “Armor Bearers”.
No visible occurrences of “Alter Bearers” or “Altar Bearers” remain on the Get Involved page.

file_operations.description: Update the Ministry Auxiliaries grid data so the item currently titled “Altar Bearers” displays “Armor Bearers”, and ensure no remaining occurrences of the old label appear on this page.

requirements.summary: Replace the Ministries page “Ministry Seals” imagery with newly generated modern, youthful assets and update the image catalog to reference the new static files.
acceptanceCriteria: The images shown in the Ministries page “Ministry Seals” section use newly generated, modern-looking assets (not the prior dated-looking images).
New images are stored as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced from the frontend (not served via the backend).
All updated ministry images visually read as modern/current (clean typography, contemporary photo/graphic style, vibrant and youthful tone).

file_operations.description: Add the newly generated modern collage image asset for the Ministries page Ministry Seals section as a static public asset.
Add the newly generated modern 'Gathering at 6' flyer-style image asset as a static public asset.
Add the newly generated modern 'Save the Date' flyer-style image asset as a static public asset.
Add the newly generated modern community outreach photo-style image asset as a static public asset.

Replace the existing Ministry Seals image catalog entries to reference the new static assets under 'generated/' (ministry-seals-modern-collage.dim_1200x1200.png, gathering-at-6-modern-flyer.dim_1200x1200.png, save-the-date-modern-flyer.dim_1200x1200.png, church-outreach-modern.dim_1200x1200.png) and update alt text as needed to match the refreshed visuals.
